identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King. Zoom in. Negative Space. Contrast.

theme.strategy: Retail Brightness. High contrast for readability in bright environments. Cleanliness is the core emotion.

headings.usage: Page titles, Modal headers, POS totals

body.usage: Data tables, form inputs, general text

monospace.usage: Order IDs, Receipt previews, Technical data

primary.name: Royal Slate
primary.usage: Primary actions, Active states, Brand anchor

grid_system.pos_terminal: Bento Mode B (High Density) - grid-cols-12 gap-4

buttons.style: Solid, high contrast. Pill-shaped for primary actions on POS.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border, subtle shadow-sm. No heavy drop shadows.

inputs.style: h-12 for touch targets. Border-slate-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500

navigation.style: Sidebar for Desktop POS, Bottom Nav for Mobile.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used sparingly on sticky headers (backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80).

motion.interactions: Scale down on click (active:scale-95), Lift on hover (-translate-y-0.5)

media.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (for polished look)

accessibility.contrast: WCAG AA Compliant (4.5:1 for normal text)

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the POS terminal with a focus on speed and touch capability.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the main dashboard.
Ensure all text is high-contrast against the light background.
Use Manrope for all headings and Inter for body text.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle textures.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Fresh Utility' palette.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Create depth through layered design elements.
Do not apply universal transitions (transition: all).
Do not center align the app container.
Use modern button styles with interaction animations.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
